body: The target is suddenly beset with unexplainable doubts about the effectiveness of its actions and the righteousness of its cause. The creature takes a –10 penalty on its ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks, until the duration ends, or until it spends its entire turn doing absolutely nothing (it spends a full-round action gaining focus). Spending an entire turn doing nothing discharges the spell.
description: Target gains penalties on ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks until it spends an entire round doing nothing.
level_text: Bard: 2; Skald: 2; Inquisitor: 2; Sorcerer: 2; Wizard: 2; Arcanist: 2; Witch: 2
name: Qualm
